MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY2 postcode area of Kirkcaldy. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:00pm to safely carry out repair work on a grounded overhead line and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:54pm on Friday, 22 January 2021
